content.question: A <math alttext="40.0 milliliters" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>40.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>mL</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> sample of the weak base <math alttext="C 5 H 11 N" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>11</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>N</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> was titrated with <math alttext="1.00 molar H C l" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1.00</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>M</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>HCl</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> at <math alttext="25 degrees Celsius " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>25</mn><mi>°</mi><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>. Based on the resulting titration curve shown above, which of the following pairs provide the best estimates for the <math alttext="p K sub b" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>p</mtext><msub><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="K sub b" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> of <math alttext="C 5 H 11 N" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>11</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>N</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="p K sub b is approximately equal to 3.0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>p</mtext><msub><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></msub><mo>≈</mo><mn>3.0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="K sub b is approximately equal to 1 times 10 to the negative 3 power" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></msub><mo>≈</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="p K sub b is approximately equal to 5.8" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>p</mtext><msub><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></msub><mo>≈</mo><mn>5.8</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="K sub b is approximately equal to 2 times 10 to the negative 6 power" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></msub><mo>≈</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="p K sub b is approximately equal to 11.0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>p</mtext><msub><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></msub><mo>≈</mo><mn>11.0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="K sub b is approximately equal to 1 times 10 to the negative 11 power" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></msub><mo>≈</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="p K sub b is approximately equal to 12.5" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>p</mtext><msub><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></msub><mo>≈</mo><mn>12.5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="K sub b is approximately equal to 3 times 10 to the negative 2 power" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></msub><mo>≈</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="p K sub b is approximately equal to 3.0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>p</mtext><msub><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></msub><mo>≈</mo><mn>3.0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="K sub b is approximately equal to 1 times 10 to the negative 3 power" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></msub><mo>≈</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 5.D: Identify information presented graphically to solve a problem.
